name: LUX PLUS | LUX MAX | LUX-M | ASP | MPD | ARES
description: We pride ourselves in our diverse range of product offerings for the global marketplace. LUX PLUS, LUX MAX, LUX-M, MPD, ARES and ASP protective films have been specifically formulated for peak performance abroad, offering clients the level of protection & finish quality they expect from XPEL.
